sentences: Athanasios (Thanos) Petrelis (Greek: Θάνος Πετρέλης, born September 27, 1975) is a Greek singer.

sentences: He is married and has three children.

sentences: He married Sofia Moschopoulou on July 1, 2007, in a wedding ceremony that also served as a baptism for their then ten-month-old daughter.

sentences: Phoivos served as Petrelis' koumbaros in the wedding, while Nino served as the godfather and Maria Levendi as the godmother for Agapi's baptism.
section: == Personal life ==

sentences: On January 5, 2009, Petrelis' wife gave birth to their second daughter in Athens, Greece.
